challenge.title: Step 2
challenge.description: Add two meta tags, one to optimize your page for mobile devices, and one to specify an accepted charset for the page.

tests.text: You should add two meta elements to your page.
One meta element should have a name set to viewport, and content set to width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0.
The other meta element should have the charset attribute set to UTF-8.
